name: Borderlands 2: Sir Hammerlock’s Big Game Hunt
name_original: Borderlands 2: Sir Hammerlock’s Big Game Hunt
description:
Borderlands 2: Sir Hammerlock’s Big Game Hunt is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2013. 2K Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Borderlands 2: Sir Hammerlock’s Big Game Hunt is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
